content: *one of our menagerie of amigurumi animals this cleverl little owl is sure to be a favorite lion brand yarn * skill level easy 4 colors 1 ball each vanna s choice® article #860 or wool-ease® article #620 crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm split ring stitch markers 2 plastic safety eyes 9 mm diameter fiberfill stuffing some construction required to finish available in different versions 81011ad 1 2005 published in michael s create vanna s choice® article #860 *pea green magenta honey white* 70593ad 2 november 2007 published in knit 1 wool-ease® article #620 *lemongrass zinnia sienna fisherman* 1 https //www lionbrand com/products/crochet-pattern-amigurumi-owl-3 2 https //www lionbrand com/products/crochet-pattern-amigurumi-owl-2
